about_the_game:
Automate

Use simple logic building blocks to change signals and junctions. Create functioning train networks in order to deliver goods between stations in a timely matter. Transport enough cargo without any crashes to complete each level!

Optimize

Completing each level is only the beginning! Improve your solutions in a never-ending quest for efficiency! A more efficient solution comes with more satisfaction!

Compete

Fight for your spot on each level's leader-board in one (or all) of the 4 unique scoring categories. Whether you're trying to one up your friends list, or climbing the global ladder, every improvement is more satisfying than the last!

Challenges

Each level has its own optional challenge restriction that adds a unique twist and offers new and refreshing puzzles to solve! Throw away your first solution and turns things on its head as you must change your approach!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Window 10
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon R7 370 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Window 10
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon R7 370 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Train Reaction is a satisfying puzzle game about automating efficient train networks. Create the logic that powers signals and junctions in order to deliver cargo and avoid crashes. Optimize your solutions for efficiency and climb the global leader boards!
